document_data.mainbody: '''Cold domain''' was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like [[cleric]]s with cold-themed [[spell]]s and powers.{{cite book/Complete Divine|137}}
document_data.Powers: The spellcaster gained the ability to turn away and destroy [[:Category:Creatures_with_the_fire_subtype|fire creatures]] the way a good cleric [[Turn undead|turned undead]], and to rebuke, command, and strengthen [[:Creatures with the cold subtype|cold creatures]] the way an evil cleric rebuked undead.
document_data.Spells: Novice spellcasters were able to use the ''[[chill touch]]'', ''[[chill metal]]'', and ''[[sleet storm]]'' spells. Clerics of some experience could cast ''[[ice storm]]'', ''[[wall of ice]]'', and ''[[cone of cold]]''. Those that were masters of this domain had access to ''[[control weather]]'', ''[[polar ray]]'', and ''[[obedient avalanche]]''.
